thread.section_title: Barking Mad Dog Care Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.barkingmad.uk.com
thread.title: Deborah Michael
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Deborah Michael

author: Deborah Michael
title: Deborah Michael
text:
My poodle Mia has just been on her 1st little holiday with Barking Mad. I felt concerned at first but I needn't have worried. I received texts to reassure me that she was happy and that her new Auntie loved her. It was a huge relief and I enjoyed a family wedding without any worries about Mia.
I would definitely recommend Barking Mad and will be using them again.
